CustomField.description: Formula field calculated from Actual Hours divided by Estimated Hours multiplied by 100. When a value is set in Estimated Time To Completion (Task), calculated from Actual Hours divided by the sum of Actual Hours and Estimated Time To Completion (Task) multiplied by 100.
CustomField.formula: IF ( ISBLANK(pse__Estimated_Time_To_Completion__c), IF ( pse__Estimated_Hours__c == 0, 0, /* 0% on no estimate to match behavior of points */ pse__Actual_Hours__c/pse__Estimated_Hours__c ) , IF ( (pse__Estimated_Time_To_Completion__c + pse__Actual_Hours__c == 0), 0, /* 0% on no estimate to match behavior of points */ (pse__Actual_Hours__c/(pse__Estimated_Time_To_Completion__c + pse__Actual_Hours__c)) ))
CustomField.label: Percent Complete (Hours)
